notes: They can appear if a [[Primal Pod]] isn't dealt with in time or during the fight against [[The Primal Menace]] if a [[Primal Pack Beast]] isn't killed in 20 seconds after spawning. A fungosaurus will despawn if it is not killed within 5 minutes of spawning.
name: Fungosaurus
location: Possibly at [[Sparkling Pools]], [[Crystal Enigma]] and [[Monster Graveyard]].
strategy: If they appear during the hunt you should deal with them as you would with the other creatures, just being extra careful with its Root and Fear spells. During the fight against The Primal Menace they shouldn't be a priority, since you'll have to keep killing other Primal Pack Beasts in order to continue the fight.
